name: trib-styles
description: Base style and css/sass utilities for the Chicago Tribune data team.

scripts.scss: mkdir -p css && node-sass --include-path node_modules/foundation-sites/scss --source-map true --output-style compressed  --output css sass/trib-dataviz-styles.scss
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer && osascript -e 'display notification "Notification text" with title "CSS compiled"'

author: Ryan Marx
